name: Design2Code
description: Image-to-code benchmark converting UI design screenshots into executable front-end code snippets.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Layout fidelity score comparing generated code render to ground truth

test_method: Generate HTML/CSS (and optional JS) and render with the evaluation toolkit. Compute similarity via structural and pixel metrics.
notes: Specify whether component libraries were allowed. Provide rendering engine (Chrome/Playwright) version to ensure consistent screenshots.
